glsa.title: Xen: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Xen, the worst of which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code on the host system.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Xen. Please review the CVE identifiers and Xen Security Advisory referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker could potentially execute arbitrary code with privileges of Xen (QEMU) process on the host, gain privileges on the host system, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Xen users should upgrade to the latest version:
